text: Euphorbia kamponii is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. It is threatened by habitat loss. Euphorbia kamponii in the Botanical Garden Nong Nooch. Pattaya. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar kamponii Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Euphorbia kamponii
